(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Retaliatory Strike
effect: Retaliatory Strike deals additional damage equal to the damage dealt by the last attack played this combat.

name: Riverlands, Abandoned Wastes
effect: When Riverlands becomes the active Location, each player shuffles their attack hand into their Attack Deck and draws two Attack Cards.

name: Rock River Canyon
effect: Creatures with Earth have an additional 10 Energy.
A metaphor for patience: just one tiny stream carved the land into a canyon over the course of a thousand generations.

name: Rocky Refrain
effect: Target engaged Creature gains 5 Energy for each Elemental Type the opposing engaged Creature has. If the caster of this Mugic has Earth, the target Creature gains an additional 5 Energy for each Elemental Type the opposing engaged Creature has.

name: Rothar, Forceful Negotiator
effect: C:60 P:100 W:50 S:60
Rothar must move into an adjacent occupied space if able.
"Treaties are made to be broken... and so are your bones!"

name: Sandstorm Shroud
effect: When equipped Creature becomes engaged, it gains Air.

name: Savitsa
effect: C:30 P:70 W:30 S:70
Expend Fire while engaged: Both players discard two Attack Cards and draw two Attack Cards.
Like a burning portent, his flaming hair signals all who see it that they do not have long to live.

name: Scarab of Khilai
effect: Equipped Creature and Creatures engaged with it cannot lose Elemental Types.

name: Searing Symphony
effect: Deal 10 damage to target Creature for each Elemental Type it has.
Unique
The rain not only nourishes but drowns. The embers warm as well as burn.

name: Seeryn, Servant of Fire
effect: C:45 P:80 W:40 S:45
1MC: Target Creature gains Fire.
Of the High Muges who helped raise the city, Seeryn warmed to Kopond and his inclination for destructive mugic.

name: Sepmek
effect: C:45 P:25 W:60 S:85
At the beginning of your turn, flip all Battlegear equipped to Sepmek face-up.
"Do not be afraid, for these symbols are as powerful as any shield."

name: Silchaw
effect: C:80 P:40 W:60 S:30
At the beginning of combat, if the Initiative of the active Location is an Elemental Type, your engaged Creature gains that Elemental Type.
His uncanny ability to smell Vlarium earned him the name "Major Miner."

name: Silent Requiem
effect: Negate target Mugic or ability that targets a Creature with Invisibility.
Unseen, unheard, unhittable... unbeatable!

name: Silv, Servant of Air
effect: C:40 P:35 W:30 S:85
1MC: Target Creature gains Air.
"I am of storm and of gentle breeze. Of elegance, lightness and furious wrath. And now I am of your house, Enre-hep."

name: Skithia, Gothos Spy
effect: C:70 P:75 W:40 S:70
1MC: The controller of target engaged Creature reveals their attack hand. Deal 5 damage to that engaged Creature for each Elemental Type either of those revealed Attack Cards have.

name: Skopolon
effect: At the beginning of each turn, you may look at target face-down Battlegear you do not control. (That Battlegear remains face-down.)
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.

name: Skorblust
effect: C:60 P:80 W:20 S:50
When Skorblust takes damage from a Fire or Earth attack, deal 5 damage to opposing engaged Creature.
Wherever Skorblust goes, he leaves a part of himself behind.

name: Sleet Slide
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature has Water, damage dealt by Sleet Slide is reduced to 0.

name: Slufurah, Treacherous Translator
effect: C:40 P:60 W:35 S:30
At the beginning of combat, sacrifice a Battlegear equipped to your engaged Creature. If you do, that Creature gains Fire and "Fire 5."
"There! We're done. Not much need for you now, is there? The alliance is broken!"

name: Smildon
effect: C:60 P:90 W:35 S:60
Defender: Earth
1MC: The active Location loses all abilities.
Though Smildon faced many worthy foes, none was as deadly as "The Blight!"

name: Smokesurge
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature has Fire, damage dealt by Smokesurge is reduced to 0.

name: Somnort
effect: C:60 P:30 W:65 S:45
Defender: Water
Somnort's heart skipped a beat when he realized that Taffial had found the lost city of the ancient Mipedian King Kehn-sep.

name: Son'las
effect: C:50 P:45 W:60 S:70
When Son'las becomes engaged, the opposing engaged Creature loses Invisibility and your opponent reveals his or her attack hand.
"Some can shade their eyes forever, and still see all."

name: Sonata of Storms
effect: Target Creature gains "Range" and "Swift 3." If the caster of this Mugic has Air, that Creature also gains "Invisibility: Surprise."
As the thief sped away, Gespedan blamed himself for leaving the battle plans out in the open.

name: Song of Elemental Attunement
effect: Target Creature gains all of its Scanned Elemental Types.
"As ice, liquid and vapor are different forms of water, the four elements are simply different forms of nature."

name: Song of Translocation
effect: Relocate target Creature you control to any unoccupied space on the Battleboard.
"There's no shame in losing a fight. There's only shame in losing your life."

name: Star Towers of Kehn-sep
effect: At the beginning of combat, the controller of the engaged Creature with the highest Wisdom may remove a Mugic counter from a Creature they control. If they do, they may put a Mugic counter on a Creature they control.

name: Stelgar, Vicious Mutation
effect: C:20 P:20 W:20 S:20
At the end of each turn, put a Growth counter on Stelgar.
Stelgar has an additional 10 Energy and 10 in all Disciplines for each Growth counter on it.

name: Stormbird Statues
effect: Equipped Creature has "Swift 1." If equipped Creature has Air, it has "Surprise."
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.

name: Sudden Flare
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 60: Deal 5 damage.

name: Sun Chariot of Kehn-Sep
effect: When equipped Creature becomes engaged, it gains Fire.

name: Swartbron Battlesong
effect: If the caster is engaged, the opposing engaged Creature and the caster each gain Energy equal to their lowest Discipline.
In a maddening gyre, delving into the secrets of Mugic only reveals more secrets.

name: Symphony of Shielding
effect: Target attack or Mugic deals 0 damage.
As Maxxor fearlessly charged through the rain of flaming arrows, he added another tale to his legend.

name: Synaptic Acceleration
effect: Stat Check Power 100: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Speed 100: Draw an Attack Card and discard an Attack Card.

name: Tablet Sanctuary
effect: At the beginning of combat, the engaged Creature with the most Elemental Types gains a Mugic counter.
Though the tablet answered many long-debated questions, not every creature liked the answers.

name: Taffial, Cothica Hunter
effect: C:70 P:20 W:65 S:65
Expend Earth: Discard an Attack Card. If you do, return an Attack Card with Build Cost less than or equal to the discarded Attack Card to your hand.
Archaeology is the search for fact, not truth.

name: Tarin
effect: C:75 P:40 W:35 S:40
Your other Creatures with Earth have an additional 10 Energy.
Even though they are the least respected, Danian society would crumble in days without the hard-working Mandiblors.

name: Tectostrike
effect: Stat Check Courage 60: Deal 10 damage.

name: Terrantula Tackle
effect: Destroy all Battlegear equipped to engaged Creatures with less than 50 Power or Speed.

name: Thar'lyn, AZAIA Spy
effect: C:70 P:80 W:80 S:30
Expend Water while engaged: The next time Thar'lyn deals attack damage, the opposing engaged Creature loses X to all Disciplines, where X is the damage dealt.

name: Tharc, Tablet Translator
effect: C:70 P:30 W:80 S:30
1MC: Target Creature gains 50 Courage. If that Creature has Earth, it gains an additional 50 Courage.
"It pains me to admit that we could not have translated the tablet without the bugs' help."

name: The Cliffs
effect: At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain Earth.
No matter how hard they tried, the Danians could not win the staring contest.

name: The Garden
effect: At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain Water.
Water is life.

name: The Golden Heptagon
effect: Creatures can play Mugic of any Tribe or affiliation.
At the base of the Citadel, a golden room offers its visitors a taste of an elusive dream...

name: The Magma Dam
effect: Creatures without Fire have "Recklessness 5."
"It only needs to hold until Chaor's hordes have amassed!"

name: The Passage, OverWorld
effect: The first time a Creature gains an Elemental Type this turn, it gains 10 Energy.
From the warm rays of the inviting sun, the stairs spiral into chilling darkness...

name: The Passage, UnderWorld
effect: The first time a Creature loses an Elemental Type this turn, it loses 10 Energy.
...plunging into the void until a faint glow illuminates from bellow, a light not so inviting.

name: The Phlogiston
effect: At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain Fire.
The land melts, boils and erupts, creating an ever-shifting landscape.

name: The Storm Tunnel, Lingering Monsoon
effect: The engaged Creature with the lowest Speed plays attacks at random.
The scars of war remain long after the battle is over.

name: The Storms
effect: At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain Air.
"Someone must have carved these statues. So where are they?"

name: The Swartbron
effect: The engaged Creature with the lowest Courage fails all Checks on attacks it plays.
Night flows like a river here.

name: Toadore
effect: C:60 P:70 W:30 S:35
Expend Fire while engaged: Destroy all Battlegear on engaged Creatures.
You think H'earring's breath is bad after a bag of Dractyl scales? Wait 'til you get a whiff of Toadore's belches!

name: Traditionalist's Charge
effect: Stat Check Power 100: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Courage 100: Gain 5 Energy.

name: Trident of Treachery
effect: If equipped Creature would deal 20 or more Fire damage, you may prevent that damage and Trident of Treachery deals 10 damage to a Creature of your choice instead.

name: Turbulence Funnel
effect: Stat Check Speed 60: Deal 10 damage.

name: Ulmanator
effect: Creatures engaged with equipped Creature have 10 less to all Disciplines for each Elemental Type they have.

name: Ulmar, Perithon Racer
effect: C:40 P:30 W:70 S:30
Expend Fire: Deal 10 damage to target Creature.
To improve the Ulmanator's top speed, Ulmar removed all unnecessary components from the vehicle. Unfortunately, that included the brakes.

name: Unbalancing Battlesong
effect: Caster gains 15 Energy and Creatures engaged with caster lose 15 Energy.
"Mugic is older than time and stronger than power. It will outlast us all."

name: Unda, Servant of Water
effect: C:55 P:35 W:80 S:45
1MC: Target Creature gains Water.
"I am the servant to the Emperor of Water, and I am at your service, OverWorlders."

name: Ursis
effect: C:60 P:85 W:45 S:45
Though Ursis appears ferocious, in realty, he is much fiercer than you can imagine.

name: Vacuum Hemisphere
effect: Earth: The opposing engaged Creature loses Air.

name: Valban
effect: C:75 P:40 W:65 S:40
At the beginning of combat, Valban gains all Elemental Types Infected Creatures have.
Parasites feed off the strength of their host.

name: Vapor Wipeout
effect: Gain Air

name: Varanohs
effect: Equipped Creature has "Range" and "Swift 1" for each Creature in your discard pile.
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.

name: Vlar
effect: C:80 P:60 W:50 S:60
At the beginning of combat, if Vlar is unequipped, any Battlegear equipped to the opposing engaged Creature becomes equipped to Vlar.

name: Vlaric Shard, Relic of the Past
effect: Equipped Creature with Earth deals an additional 5 attack damage.
When you shuffle your Attack Deck, destroy Vlaric Shard.

name: Voltorch
effect: Stat Check Power 60: Deal 5 damage.

name: Voorx
effect: C:40 P:70 W:60 S:30
When Voorx becomes engaged, your opponent may sacrifice a Battlegear. If they do not, Voorx gains "Fire 5" and "Water 5."

name: Wall of Flame
effect: Air: Flip one Battlegear face-up and one Battlegear face-down.

name: Xenocentric Wrath
effect: Deal 10 damage if the opposing engaged Creature does not share a Tribe with the Creature playing this attack.

name: Xerium Armor
effect: If equipped Creature would take more than 20 damage from an attack, it takes 20 damage instead.
Unique

name: Ylinné
effect: C:50 P:30 W:40 S:75
1MC: Target Creature gains "Invisibility: Strike 10." If that Creature has Air, it also gains "Invisibility: Surprise."
None shall pass - at least, not in one piece.

name: Yondaf, Symbiotic Infector
effect: C:60 P:35 W:65 S:30
At the beginning of the turn, if Yondaf is Uninfected, Infect it.
Uninfect 3 Creatures: Deal 10 damage to target Creature.

name: Zamool, Lord Van Bloot's Enforcer
effect: C:75 P:60 W:40 S:80
While Zamool is engaged, opposing Creatures cannot play Mugic or abilities.
Unique
Darker than night. Quieter than silence. More terrifying than fear.

name: Zhade, Dig Site Defender
effect: C:65 P:45 W:30 S:95
Invisibility: Strike 15
Zhade makes sure that those spies unfortunate enough to learn what was unearthed never report their findings.
